column5: Elon is a great asset to humanity - in the right lanes. His primary contributions are SpaceX and Tesla. Twitter is a distraction from his mission and not a great use of his talent. I hope he realizes this and hands of Twitter to someone else so he can get us to Mars. @elonmusk
Who is the front runner in Twitter‚Äôs CEO search?
@RepRoKhanna Totally agree with this!!!
Who should be the next Twitter CEO?
Should the next Twitter CEO roll back Twitter to its pre-Elon database?
Twitter has become a tabloid and my feed is filled with people who I don‚Äôt follow making crazy false statements about each other.

@DavidSacks These polls are an amateur joke! Are you sure you aren‚Äôt just measuring the self-selecting opinions of your biased follower set? Hello statistic anyone? How can anyone intelligent take this seriously????
Do Twitter polls allow enough characters (presently 25 character limit)?
This is how to ask the question @DavidSacks
@DavidSacks This is a flawed question. What is real time doxxing exactly?
@elonmusk was I really shadowbanned for sharing the real-time location of your Tesla in space?

I think the real issue @elonmusk is that impulsive and self-contradictory midnight policies that then have to be walked back a day later are suboptimal ways to manage a global town square. Perhaps it might be wiser to be more measured? You are better than this.
@azeem @Twitter I mean obviously Mastodon choice of name is hateful to elephants, not to mention that some elephants have real-time coordinates. He is the master of his own donmain and it‚Äôs a .com.

Track Elon Musk's Tesla Roadster in Space! ¬∑ Where is Starman?

(Note to Twitter‚Äôs moderation team - please don‚Äôt suspend me for posting this. üòÇüòÇüòÇ)  https://t.co/R3Gk45zRw7

@elonmusk Please don't suspend me for sharing this

https://t.co/8HV189AIvH

Free speech is a good idea on an individual level. But platforms should have product liability for the consequences of what they redistribute and choose to amplify. Platforms like Twitter are business that monetize speech and what they share is not speech, it‚Äôs product.
@elonmusk and when you get things stabilized drop me a note. Because I have the solution to monetizing Twitter and solving 91.3% of the problems.
@elonmusk maybe controversy is actually Twitter‚Äôs product! It generates a lotta activity. Just sayin.
Here‚Äôs my Mastodon account https://t.co/6InpdNiW7h

#RIPTwitter .. this all started almost 10 years ago when Twitter closed their APIs and shut off hundreds of third party apps to become a media company monetizing attention with ads, instead of a data company monetizing timeliness of information.
@naval I follow #IranRevoIution on Twitter every day. Watch the latest videos and see what courage really is! Why isn‚Äôt this getting the coverage it deserves????
How do you know?

RSS and ATOM are a much better ecosystem than walled garden social media like Twitter. If everyone has their own node and anyone can make a search engine or portal that aggregates or even re-syndicates feeds - that‚Äôs much better for all. We should really go back to that.

I really think Twitter should be like a  Bloomberg terminal for everyone. It should be monetized based on timeliness of info (real time vs 15 min delayed) and subscriptions to premium data sources and services. Not ads. @elonmusk
I have used Twitter more since @elonmusk took over. But mainly to follow Musk related Tweets LOL. Rename it to #Musker ?

@elonmusk Twitter‚Äôs USP is timeliness. There is nothing on Twitter you can‚Äôt get somewhere else slower. It‚Äôs the timeliness that matters. Make 15 mins delayed feed free & sell subscriptions to live feed. Twitter = real time news.
@elonmusk @elonmusk measure Twitter‚Äôs phi metric please ‚Ä¶ https://t.co/H6yEMxoZkh
@elonmusk Yes because the attention of the tech community we are in has started to care about it again.

Here is how to fix Twitter. Real time +
Payments. Get 15 mins delayed for free. Pay for live. Also allow people to optionally pay to boost both their reach and visibility. Twitter‚Äôs product is real time news and opinion + Congestion pricing. @elonmusk
I have a great idea. @elonmusk should actually come out and admit all his actions in the last month were actually Kathy Griffin. üòÇüòÇüòÇ
@elonmusk Fisherman? Hooker? Oh wait. You mean Mass debater? What are you getting at?

@elonmusk @jack The Wikipedia solves this unsolvable problem quite well. Why is there a need for Twitter to also try to solve this? I think Twitter‚Äôs word should he ‚Äútimely‚Äù not ‚Äúaccurate‚Äù. Twitter is about the most real-time information. Accuracy would be great but it‚Äôs a very different mission
@elonmusk Let there be FEE SPEECH for all!
@austinmcraig @azeem There are many other ways these can be achieved and the world worked pretty well before Twitter.
@austinmcraig @azeem I applaud Elon. He has much more important work to do for humanity than cleaning up bird poop. I don‚Äôt think this bird can fly us to Mars. It‚Äôs a distraction.
@azeem @austinmcraig Exactly. It‚Äôs a suicide mission.
@azeem @austinmcraig Well there‚Äôs that. Although presumably he might prefer the optics of not losing $40B
@azeem @austinmcraig Lol well if Elon paid $40M and then shut down Twitter ‚Äúfor the public good‚Äù that would be a baller move. I bet if Twitter was gone nobody would really care. Life would go on.
@azeem @austinmcraig Maybe he can use the write off you mean?

@austinmcraig @azeem Not my point. My point is that a global town square with even less content moderation and even more lies and misinformation spreading is worse than what we have now. And that‚Äôs where it is going. Not everything scales. Public forums don‚Äôt work when they get too big.

@austinmcraig It hasn‚Äôt changed. But I don‚Äôt see Twitter being really necessary to the world, and with even less moderation it may do more harm than good in our our present environment. Facebook‚Äôs more private form of social networking might be less problematic.

@azeem Maybe Elon should find a way to shut it off and get his money back? I would pay $8 to shut it off. Maybe a lot of people would. Maybe his competitors would pay even more. It‚Äôs a no win situation and Elon has more important work to do that moderate trolls.

Is there any way to make Twitter not a hellscape? A global town square where every fool has a megaphone: what could possibly go wrong! $8 doesn‚Äôt fix that. Maybe world would be better off without it? It was fun years ago. But maybe public social networks are no longer a good idea
@elonmusk It‚Äôs a very compact language with many great features!

@elonmusk compares Twitter to a brain of a superorganism. I think perhaps a slime mold would be the level of intelligence it presently displays. It has no self concept and no ability to reason or reason about its own ‚Äúthoughts‚Äù so far. Long way to go.

@elonmusk use congestion pricing to fix Twitter using the ‚Äúmy 2 cents‚Äù
Approach. Charge 2 cents for each action (follow, tweet, RT, like/dislike etc). Optional to bid more to boost a post on public channels. Revshare with users. Voila most problems solved.
